name: Shakir
text: When the great event comes to pass,

name: Shakir
text: There is no belying its coming to pass--

name: Shakir
text: Abasing (one party), exalting (the other),

name: Shakir
text: When the earth shall be shaken with a (severe) shaking,

name: Shakir
text: And the mountains shall be made to crumble with (an awful) crumbling,

name: Shakir
text: So that they shall be as scattered dust.

name: Shakir
text: And you shall be three sorts.

name: Shakir
text: Then (as to) the companions of the right hand; how happy are the companions of the right hand!

name: Shakir
text: And (as to) the companions of the left hand; how wretched are the companions of the left hand!

name: Shakir
text: And the foremost are the foremost,

name: Shakir
text: These are they who are drawn nigh (to Allah),

name: Shakir
text: In the gardens of bliss.

name: Shakir
text: A numerous company from among the first,

name: Shakir
text: And a few from among the latter.

name: Shakir
text: On thrones decorated,

name: Shakir
text: Reclining on them, facing one another.

name: Shakir
text: Round about them shall go youths never altering in age,

name: Shakir
text: With goblets and ewers and a cup of pure drink;

name: Shakir
text: They shall not be affected with headache thereby, nor shall they get exhausted,

name: Shakir
text: And fruits such as they choose,

name: Shakir
text: And the flesh of fowl such as they desire.

name: Shakir
text: And pure, beautiful ones,

name: Shakir
text: The like of the hidden pearls:

name: Shakir
text: A reward for what they used to do.

name: Shakir
text: They shall not hear therein vain or sinful discourse,

name: Shakir
text: Except the word peace, peace.

name: Shakir
text: And the companions of the right hand; how happy are the companions of the right hand!

name: Shakir
text: Amid thornless lote-trees,

name: Shakir
text: And banana-trees (with fruits), one above another.

name: Shakir
text: And extended shade,

name: Shakir
text: And water flowing constantly,

name: Shakir
text: And abundant fruit,

name: Shakir
text: Neither intercepted nor forbidden,

name: Shakir
text: And exalted thrones.

name: Shakir
text: Surely We have made them to grow into a (new) growth,

name: Shakir
text: Then We have made them virgins,

name: Shakir
text: Loving, equals in age,

name: Shakir
text: For the sake of the companions of the right hand.

name: Shakir
text: A numerous company from among the first,

name: Shakir
text: And a numerous company from among the last.

name: Shakir
text: And those of the left hand, how wretched are those of the left hand!

name: Shakir
text: In hot wind and boiling water,

name: Shakir
text: And the shade of black smoke,

name: Shakir
text: Neither cool nor honorable.

name: Shakir
text: Surely they were before that made to live in ease and plenty.

name: Shakir
text: And they persisted in the great violation.

name: Shakir
text: And they used to say: What! when we die and have become dust and bones, shall we then indeed be raised?

name: Shakir
text: Or our fathers of yore?

name: Shakir
text: Say: The first and the last,

name: Shakir
text: Shall most surely be gathered together for the appointed hour of a known day.

name: Shakir
text: Then shall you, O you who err and call it a lie!

name: Shakir
text: Most surely eat of a tree of Zaqqoom,

name: Shakir
text: And fill (your) bellies with it;

name: Shakir
text: Then drink over it of boiling water;

name: Shakir
text: And drink as drinks the thirsty camel.

name: Shakir
text: This is their entertainment on the day of requital.

name: Shakir
text: We have created you, why do you not then assent?

name: Shakir
text: Have you considered the seed?

name: Shakir
text: Is it you that create it or are We the creators?

name: Shakir
text: We have ordained death among you and We are not to be overcome,

name: Shakir
text: In order that We may bring in your place the likes of you and make you grow into what you know not.

name: Shakir
text: And certainly you know the first growth, why do you not then mind?

name: Shakir
text: Have you considered what you sow?

name: Shakir
text: Is it you that cause it to grow, or are We the causers of growth?

name: Shakir
text: If We pleased, We should have certainly made it broken down into pieces, then would you begin to lament:

name: Shakir
text: Surely we are burdened with debt:

name: Shakir
text: Nay! we are deprived.

name: Shakir
text: Have you considered the water which you drink?

name: Shakir
text: Is it you that send it down from the clouds, or are We the senders?

name: Shakir
text: If We pleased, We would have made it salty; why do you not then give thanks?

name: Shakir
text: Have you considered the fire which you strike?

name: Shakir
text: Is it you that produce the trees for it, or are We the producers?

name: Shakir
text: We have made it a reminder and an advantage for the wayfarers of the desert.

name: Shakir
text: Therefore glorify the name of your Lord, the Great.

name: Shakir
text: But nay! I swear by the falling of stars;

name: Shakir
text: And most surely it is a very great oath if you only knew;

name: Shakir
text: Most surely it is an honored Quran,

name: Shakir
text: In a book that is protected

name: Shakir
text: None shall touch it save the purified ones.

name: Shakir
text: A revelation by the Lord of the worlds.

name: Shakir
text: Do you then hold this announcement in contempt?

name: Shakir
text: And to give (it) the lie you make your means of subsistence.

name: Shakir
text: Why is it not then that when it (soul) comes up to the throat,

name: Shakir
text: And you at that time look on--

name: Shakir
text: And We are nearer to it than you, but you do not see--

name: Shakir
text: Then why is it not-- if you are not held under authority--

name: Shakir
text: That you send it (not) back-- if you are truthful?

name: Shakir
text: Then if he is one of those drawn nigh (to Allah),

name: Shakir
text: Then happiness and bounty and a garden of bliss.

name: Shakir
text: And if he is one of those on the right hand,

name: Shakir
text: Then peace to you from those on the right hand.

name: Shakir
text: And if he is one of the rejecters, the erring ones,

name: Shakir
text: He shall have an entertainment of boiling water,

name: Shakir
text: And burning in hell.

name: Shakir
text: Most surely this is a certain truth.

name: Shakir
text: Therefore glorify the name of your Lord, the Great.
